name: PivotAI Career Quest
description: An immersive MMORPG experience that transforms career development into an epic adventure
overview: PivotAI Career Quest transforms the original cloud-themed career platform into an immersive MMORPG experience where career development becomes an epic adventure. Users become 'Career Adventurers' who level up their professional skills, complete career quests, and unlock achievements on their journey to professional mastery.

characterSystem.experiencePoints: Earned through completing tasks, updating skills, and career milestones

questSystem.mainQuests: Major career milestones (certification completion, job applications, interviews)
questSystem.sideQuests: Smaller professional development tasks (networking events, skill-building)
questSystem.dailyQuests: Regular career maintenance activities (application follow-ups, learning tasks)
questSystem.questJournal: Organized task management with quest rewards and deadlines
questSystem.questChains: Series of related professional development activities

progressionSystem.skillTrees: Visual skill development paths with branching specializations
progressionSystem.achievements: Badges and titles for career accomplishments

mainGameInterface.description: Game HUD-style fixed components with medieval/fantasy styling
elements: Character portrait and level in top-left corner
Mini-map in top-right corner showing career progression
Action bar with quick-access abilities at bottom of screen
Quest tracker persistently visible on right side
Character stats displayed as medieval-style meters
Skill trees visualized as interconnected constellations
Equipment slots for 'gear' (resume templates, portfolio pieces)
Achievement display with unlocked badges and titles
Categorized quests (Main, Side, Daily)
Quest cards with objectives, rewards, and difficulty rating
Progress indicators for multi-stage quests
Animated completion effects
Industry-specific 'guilds' to join
Mentor/mentee system with 'party' formation
Guild reputation meters and rank

worldMap.description: Career journey visualized as fantasy world map
elements: Different regions representing industry sectors
Discovered job opportunities appear as location markers
Fast-travel to previously visited career milestones
Fog of war effect for unexplored career areas

primaryActionButton.decoration: Fantasy-styled corners with subtle glow effect

xpBar.tooltip: Shows exact XP numbers on hover

skillProgress.style: Circular progress indicators with fantasy styling

statMeters.description: Vertical or horizontal meters for each stat

levelUpNotification.text: Large animated 'LEVEL UP!' text with glow effects
levelUpNotification.content: Stat increases displayed with before/after values

achievementAlert.style: Toast notification from top with bg-amber-100

tutorialSystem.description: Interactive tutorial quest line with 'Guide' NPC
elements: Step-by-step introduction to platform features
Tooltips that appear for first-time feature usage
Skip Tutorial option for experienced users
Tutorial rewards to encourage completion

dailyEngagement.description: Features to encourage regular platform usage
elements: Login rewards with increasing value for consecutive days
Daily quests that refresh every 24 hours
Rested XP bonus for returning users
Weekly challenges with premium rewards
Guild system for professional networking groups
Party formation for collaborative projects
Mentor/mentee matchmaking with XP bonuses
Leaderboards for specific skills or industries
Raid events for group interview preparation

rewardSystems.lootDrops: Random skill resources after completing tasks
rewardSystems.titles: Unlockable professional titles displayed by username

environmentEffects.background: Dynamic background that evolves with career level
environmentEffects.weather: Effects based on recent performance (sunny for success, stormy for challenges)
environmentEffects.seasonal: Events tied to industry hiring cycles

responsiveDesign.tablet: Dual-panel layout with character sheet and quest log
responsiveDesign.desktop: Full immersive interface with all elements visible
responsiveDesign.largeDesktop: Enhanced visual effects and expanded world map

accessibilityFeatures: High contrast mode with enhanced readability
Alternative UI that maintains game mechanics without fantasy visuals
Screen reader compatible quest descriptions and instructions
Customizable UI scaling and text size
Option to reduce animations and effects

dashboard.description: Character standing in central hub with NPCs representing different features
elements: Quick-access portal icons to different 'zones' (Resume Builder, Job Search, etc.)
Daily quest board with flashing available quests
Mailbox for notifications and messages
Adventure log showing recent activities and progress

careerRoadmap.description: Interactive fantasy world map with different regions for career paths
elements: Skill constellation system with connecting nodes
Path selection with branching progression options
Discoverable hidden areas representing niche skills
Location-based quests tied to job opportunities

profilePage.description: Full character visualization with equipped items
elements: Detailed stat breakdown with tooltips
Experience log showing history of earned XP
Achievement gallery with unlocked badges
Reputation meters with different factions (industries)

jobApplications.description: Job opportunities displayed as quest scrolls on a board
elements: Difficulty rating from 1-5 stars
Required skills/level listed as prerequisites
Expected rewards (salary, benefits) as quest rewards
Application status with visual progress tracker

resumeBuilder.description: Crafting-style interface for building resume components
elements: Skill gems that can be slotted into resume template
Preview mode showing completed equipment
Material collection representing experiences and skills
Upgrade system for improving existing resume components

frontend: React components for modular UI elements
Tailwind CSS for styling with custom fantasy-themed extensions
Local storage for saving progress and preferences
Animation libraries for complex effects (Framer Motion)
SVG assets for scalable fantasy UI elements
